mng: rather, quite, considerably, oblique, inclined, slanting, Taiwan pr. [po3]

exm.mng: Lian Po (327-243 BC), famous general of Zhao 趙國|赵国, repeatedly victorious over Qin 秦國|秦国 and Qi 齊國|齐国
Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan

exm.cur: 德宏傣族景颇族自治州
exm.trd: 德宏傣族景頗族自治州

exm.pyn: Dé hóng Dǎi zú Jǐng pō zú zì zhì zhōu
